name: Draoi
description: Draoi (pronounced "Dree") is a VR, Online, Multiplayer, Magic Battleground where you carve spells in the air with your bare hands!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-3820 @ 3.6GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive or Oculus Rift headset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-7700 @ 3.6GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive or Oculus Rift headset
